chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joshua M Andersen not in court, in custody.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court for Joshua M Andersen.  Attorney Samuel Tufford in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant refused to appear in court.  Counsel waived the defendant's appearance.  Counsel request a plea date a ways out to provide a report.
Plea hearing scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Joshua M Andersen not in court, in custody.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court for Joshua M Andersen.  Attorney Samuel Tufford in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant not produced for today's court date.  Defendant's appearance is waived.

Defense has received discovery and an offer and request another scheduling
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court, defendant Joshua M Andersen not in court, in custody.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense waives clients appearance.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant's appearance is waived.  Discovery and offer received.  Defense request an adjournment to review with client.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen in court with Attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen in custody.  Thomas L. Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective A. Farina.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15.   
Please be advised, Effective July 30, 2022, this calendar will be assigned to Branch 06, Judge Ellen R. Brostrom, in Room 506 of the Safety Building.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Johnson in trial this week. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Thomas Holland Reed for Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court, defendant Joshua Lee Andersen not in court, in custody.  Defendant's Appearance Waived.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Hearing, pursuant to State V. Lee.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson recently appointed.  Case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V-Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with ES and his immediate family, no unsupervised contact with any child under the age of 18.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring.   If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $35,000.00 .  If alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. Court sets a curfew of 6:00pm -7:00am defendant must be in his house.
  Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Joshua Lee Andersen in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
